channel.title: Treasure on Richard's Lullaby

item.title: Good blogs
item.description: Here are some blogs I found very worth reading. This post will update continuously. https://charlesliuyx.github.io This blog was writen in Chinese, topics including machine learning, blockchain, Chinese ancient poems, etc. https://yiqinfu.github.io A PhD student’s blog which contains a lot of very deep and interesting thoughts. https://type.cyhsu.xyz
